| **If you're a User** | In order to perform the following actions, you may need to log in. Please ask your administrator for your login credentials. Learn more about:* [Creating a page](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage) * [Editing a page](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/EditingAPage) * [Page history](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/PageHistory) |

ai_answer:
This text outlines steps for getting started with a new wiki, categorized by user roles:

1. **User**: After logging in, users can create and edit pages, and view page history. More information on these tasks is provided in the User Guide under "Getting Started."
2. **Administrator**: Admins can change the logo and panels, create new users, and set user rights. Guidance for these steps is available in the User Guide as well.
3. **Developer**: Developers can build applications, extend the platform with custom plugins, or develop complex web applications using XWiki's powerful programming features, documented in the Developer's Guide. Additional resources and extensions are available on the Extensions wiki, while documentation for XWiki Development is located in the XWiki Development Zone.

The next section provides a link to "Step 1 Creating a page" in the User Guide.
